Reviews.Title: The Absolute Best Phablet Experience
Reviews.Author: methylamine
Reviews.Content: Full disclosure, I purchased the i9200 from an eBay seller as there are no 16gb versions available for this device on amazon. Price was four seventy nine for the 16gb version.  I found the 8gb version of this phone severely limited the amount of apps I could download. 16gb is perfect as I could download multiple 3D HD games like dead trigger, need for speed and ashphalt hd without filling up the phones internal storage.  I also purchased the i9205 LTE version from Amazon about a month ago but I had to return that device since it had some issues.I'm a Galaxy Note user who has had the note since September of 2011. When the Note 2 came out I decided to skip it because I didn't think it was that worthy of an upgrade. So the Note has been my primary device for almost 2 years.Like you, I discovered the Mega 6.3 and began reading up on it and watching video reviews online. My initial worry was that it wouldn't be as fast as the current flagships and that I'd regret buying a device with last years specs.My reasoning to go ahead an purchase the Mega was based on the fact that to me it would feel like an upgrade since I was coming from my old Note.After using the Mega all my fears of it being underpowered and slow were gone. The device has a large bright crisp LCD display which I can now see clearly in daylight! The 1.5 GB RAM is handling my multitasking very well as I've yet seen a launcher redraw occur. The device is very snappy and has had no issues playing large MKV files. One of the coolest features that I was excited about was the IR port. Now you can control all your living room devices with your phone. The i9200 camera is on par with the galaxy note 2. For some reason the mega 6.3 i9205 that I tested had a poor performing camera. This i9200 performs much better,  not sure if different firmware is the reason. Either way I'm much happier with the camera quality on the i9200.The big win with this phone is the sheer amount of real estate you get. The original Note fits within the Mega 6.3's display area. You aren't just getting a phone when you get a Mega 6.3 you are also getting a small tablet. This device is a true Phablet. While the Note 1 and 2 were big devices the Mega elevates the browsing and media viewing experience to a true tablet level experience. If this is what you are interested in then I highly recommend picking up this device. So to recap, this device has a great display, versatile form factor, decent camera and great performance.And I hope I don't understate that the battery life is AMAZING!. I'm used to phones beeping low battery warnings around 5-6pm. With the Mega I no longer have to worry about my battery life. I literally cannot kill the battery. By the time I hook up the charger at night its 11PM and the Mega still has 20% battery left. And this is with HEAVY usage. I can take the Mega off charger at 6am and still have battery left in the very late evening.If you are trying to win the antutu, quadrant benchmark wars then I suggest you stay away from the Mega as the S4 is the current flagship which is putting up crazy benchmark numbers.If you are looking for a large crisp HD display with last years flagship specs and excellent real world performance then the Mega 6.3 is your device. The only thing that should hold you back from this purchase is whether you want to wait for the Note 3 which will have the S-Pen, better camera and a 1080P display. The Mega 6.3 I picked up was the 16gb version for four seventy nine shipped from e bay. The unlocked international note 3 will start at mid $700's most likely.I can personally confirm that this phone (i9200) does work on AT&T; 3G and 2G frequencies. My Mega 6.3 i9200 is running on AT&T; 3G HSPA+. Unlike the unlocked Note N7000 and Galaxy S II I didn't have to enter any APN settings when I inserted my AT&T; SIM. The Mega automatically defined the proper AT&T; APN settings and the 3G was working great. You will need a MICRO SIM for this phone. If you have a standard sized SIM you can either cut it down to MICRO SIM size or visit an AT&T; store and ask for a MICRO SIM.The Mega 6.3 GT i9200 will NOT work with ANY AMERICAN LTE (4G) frequency. In North America we use LTE frequencies 700, 800, 1900, 1700, 2100 MHz which are bands 4, 12, 13, 17, 25AT&T; uses BAND 4 and 17 Frequencies 1700/2100 for Band 4 and 700 for Band 17T-Mobile uses BAND 4 Frequencies 1700/2100 AWSThe i9200 has NO LTE radio so AT&T; 3G HSPA+ is all you will get with the GT i9200 here in the United States. You will get 2G on T-Mobile or 3.5G HSPA if you are in an area where T-mobile has refarmed their 1900 band. This phone isn't compatible with Verizon.******************************************************************************************************ATT subscribers may ask themselves why should they buy the full price unlocked phone versus the $99 on contract Mega 6.3 that AT&T; is currently offering? Well one major reason is that the AT&T; Mega 6.3 has a locked boot loader. If you don't know what that means then you should get your Mega 6.3 directly from AT&T.; However if you enjoy performing modifications to your phone such as rooting and flashing custom roms then the i9200 and i9205 are the only options you have with the Mega 6.3. You currently cannot root the AT&T; Mega 6.3, please be aware of this if you are thinking about purchasing directly from AT&T; and are hoping to root the AT&T; Mega 6.3*****************************************************************************************************If you purchase this unlocked international device from Amazon or any other online retailer and you live in the United States, Samsung will not warranty your phone. Buying an unlocked grey market phone that was not specifically released for your country (USA) is not eligible under Samsung's 1 year warranty. Please consider this before you purchase any unlocked international Samsung phones as they will not be covered under the Samsung warranty (It doesn't matter what the Amazon seller puts in the description about this). If you want a warranty from Samsung then either wait for your carrier (T-Mobile, AT&T; etc.) to carry the phone or purchase a 3rd party warranty from a vendor like Square Trade. You've been warned.

Reviews.Title: YES five stars
Reviews.Author: Thank you
Reviews.Content: Five stars just for the battery alone.  I used to have the droid razr and had to keep it plugged in constantly and keep the data and location services off or the phone literally drains within a couple of hours.  Taking it anywhere where I had no ability to plug in was useless and it would get extremely hot.  However in addition I have never had a phone of this quality.  Iphone shmyphone, this phone kicks all other phones ass.  I never purchased a tablet because it would be useless to me based on my lifestyle and personality.  I mostly text and talk, email and research. I not really heavy on the social networking thing.  So with this I have a great phone that will allow me to casually engage the internet as needed. I'm in love with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Size and Reception with Phone-Tablet Advantages
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: title:  Great size and receptionI think the size of this phone is terrific because the screen is large enough for easy, accurate typing and reading of websites, navigation, attachments, email, etc.  The screen clarity and colors are also great.  It fits easily into a small purse and of course in backpack or briefcase. It is light for its size.  I also find the T-Mobile reception I get with this phone is fine.  I have both phone and data plans.  The reception is as good as my Verizon reception was on my previous 4GLTE phone.  Another reviewer claimed one could only get 2G with T-Mobile on this phone and he was incorrect.  AT&T; also told me that I can use this unlocked phone with their sim card for AT&T; service.  This device is both a tablet and a phone, which is very convenient (I don't have to carry both devices) and it saves lots of money because you don't need to purchase two devices and more importantly, you don't need to pay the approximate $360 per year in extra data charges to your phone company for having data on both the phone and tablet.  The advantage of the unlocked phone is that there is no contract and if you wish you can save even more money by having no data plan and just use this smartphone  in WiFi for email and internet access while paying only basic phone charges to your carrier. Verizon does not allow users to have phone access on a Verizon locked smartphone without paying for a data plane. There is also the advantage that because this phone accepts a sim card that this phone can be used internationally and T-Mobile has very  low cost plans for international phone and data .  I have had this phone for about 2 months so these comments are based on experience.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely the best phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Erb Avore "Erb Avore"
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at this phone.Its like the 3 bears.Not too bigNot too smallIts JUST RIGHT!!!Just make sure that you a 2 handed texter.Also, be sure to get a keyboard such as "perfect keyboard"This will allow you to text extremely accurately and fast.The interals of the camera of good enough for anything needed.The only thing I liked more about my Note2 was the camera.The mega 6.3 camera is "OK" only.I give the phone a raving 5 stars for the price.Great job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: The Best Phone Ever!
Reviews.Author: lanet A.
Reviews.Content: When I first received my cell phone on November 14th I was impressed with the size of the phone. The battery is amazing because it last all day on a single charge. When I first showed my friends my new phone they were surprised that it was so big and called it a tablet. I just love my new phone.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone / tablet
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: when I receive my phone I thought because I heard from many people talking about the galaxy Mega 6.3 it is a excellent phone/tablet the colors are very bright and colorful to nature this phone is amazing you would have to see it for yourself don't let anybody tell you it is not what you need I looked at the screen and its beautiful colors I was amazed Samsung always makes beautiful colors come to life knowing people like Super AMOLED and that was my concern about the colors it is no shortcomings here colors are still beautiful and clear more I have to say but I hope this helped you a lot I got this product from Amazon they have excellent service

Reviews.Title: don't buy from this dealer
Reviews.Author: Andresia
Reviews.Content: This dealer sold me a messed up phone. Tried several times to get is fixed but the software is to bad for any technician to risk fixing.

Reviews.Title: large phablet, but can be handled by most people
Reviews.Author: latonia
Reviews.Content: When I first open the box I said to my self this is a very large phone, but after using it for an hour or two you get used to its size. I have a Samsung galaxy note 3 which is 5.7 inches and people say its a large phone but when put beside the Samsung galaxy mega 6.3 which is 6.3 inches it makes the note 3 look like a iPhone. It has a lot more screen real estate which is good for a types of media, movies, TV shows, games and ext. The only trade off with this phone and the note 3 is performance. The note has one the best CPU processors on the market the snapdragon 800 and the mega has the snapdragon 400 which is a mid level processor these days but delievers pretty decent enough performance to keep me happy and not use the note 3 as a daily driver which now sits in the box. I like the mega better than the note 3 because of the screen size even though its was the most powerful phone of 2013 but I prefer phones in the 6 inch range. The note 3 is just too small to me. That's just my opinion. So if you want a large phone with a decent amount of power, get this phone.

Reviews.Title: Am speechless with this 16 GB Phablet.
Reviews.Author: Sahil
Reviews.Content: I have this phone now almost 4 months.lot of people did the review already.am just gonna do the diffrence b/w i 9200 mega and i 9205 mega bcz i used the both phones.i was hesitating to buy this phone bcz only 3g. i was thinking i9205 gets 4g but its not . they both gets same network in US eg. H+ and E.i 9205 running little slower than i 9200 mega.so i9200 mega runs very fast.i used t mobile and simple mobile sim cards.so dont be crazy to buy only i9205 ,you can buy i 9200 with less price.i have white color . Another most important thing i got this phone from NEGRIELECTRONICS.COM bcz amazon does not have 16 gb phone .i did pay the same price as 8gb. amazon has only 8gb.but i got i 9205 8g from amazon.if you looking for to download lot of apps then you need 16gb phone.phone is huge.definetely need case for phone. pics very clear with 720 resolution. am speech less with this phone.there is nothing like samsung in this world for me.i dont know what else to say. ask me if you have any question in ur mind !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: wowwww!!!!
Reviews.Author: mike smith
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my phone it's the best phone I have ever had I wouldn't trade it for the world

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: rich buss
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine on att. The only thing I dont get is visual voice mail.  The antenna works great where I live in southeastern Michigan

Reviews.Title: worst seller in the history of amazon!!!! EVER
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone on March 15 2014 around 12am once i bough it i got an email 15 mins later saying that they posted the wrong price and I could not buy this item!!! then it has taken so much work to get my money back because they do an authorization charge, amazon had to give me store credit on the sellers behalf and gave me a huge apology. In my whole history of amazon this has never happened. I would never suggest anyone to buy from this unsure seller. i seen that another user has had issues with this seller before and im just wanting to put my experience into this as well. If your looking to buy something i would say just avoid this merchant and your much better off going somewhere else, unless you want to waste your money and have a huge headache. I mean how do you have your ad up for days straight and when someone pays like $400 at midnight you say you posted the wrong amount.....so unprofessional.

Reviews.Title: i9200 vs i9205
Reviews.Author: DEALHUNTER
Reviews.Content: I had the i9205 model previously and loved it, though since you cannot use the LTE antenna in the USA anyways, grab this i9200 and enjoy longer battery life!Every little hiccup/short coming with the i9205 is simply not present on the i9200, the i9200 is PERFECT. I thought I was compromising and taking a slight downgrade but the i9200 turned out to be better, period. So if like me you're hesitating to get the i9200 because you think the i9205 is superior, you're mistaken like I was, so long as you're in the USA, the i9200 reigns supreme!SOLID AMAZING PHONE!

Reviews.Title: Mega 6.3
Reviews.Author: Gwen Heard
Reviews.Content: The order was to be received within two days. It was received as expected and looked liked as described. I was very happy as I was without a phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: y2g
Reviews.Content: I like big. Screen is very bright and sharp. It has excellent battery life. It has very good sound and loud enough. If you read books like me, no doubt should go with this phone. No need to carry another tablet. This is 2 in 1. Love it!!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: phillip
Reviews.Content: I love it a nice big phone to have with very handy for men with big hand thanks for a good phone

Reviews.Title: The best phone .
Reviews.Author: Najaulee
Reviews.Content: The best phone. No problems with it. fast delivery. The phone can also be used as a tablet...so for me, its a phablet. love it

Reviews.Title: Love the phone . No regrets .
Reviews.Author: Carl Tischer
Reviews.Content: I received my I9200 today and was very happy to see it and turn it on . I had a galaxy note 2 but I dropped it and it went downhill from there . I decided to go with the mega simply for the size . The note 2 was big but this thing takes me well into the true phablet arena . I've been playing with this i9200 for a couple hours now and don't see a lot of difference other than the awesome extra real estate in now have . Very happy with the phone and very happy with the company I bought it from  as well . Beware of a company called wireless experts inc though . Do not purchase anything from them . I'm happy I went with this company after wireless experts inc  lied to me and cost me time .  I was without a phone and days matter . This company delivered my phone in a very timely manner . No regrets so far . Awesome screen and fits well in my hands . I love it .

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: Nana SKM
Reviews.Content: I haven't connected to a server yet, will probably be att.  But I love the size and being able to type w/o errors and read, it is just like a smaller iPad.  I can't hardly wait to connect it in early May.  Love this product.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I honestly just wanted the biggest phone out and I had no idea this phone was going to be that BIG! It's beautiful lol definitely a head turner! I was amazed how awesome this phone turned out to be. My last phone was the galaxy s3, and it for sure looks like my new phone gave birth to the s3! The screen is massive, and I highly doubt it will it fit in any pockets-just letting you know right now-but if you want a phone that grabs eyes all around you and amazes everyone that's never seen one this phone is perfect for you. It's colors are fantastic, and not as pixel like as other reviews have said.  I LOVE this phone and I'm so glad i purchased it. And just because its the i9200 definitely doesnt make it a slow phone. I was hesitant at first before I bought it, and it's not an issue at all. I recommend this phone to everyone!

Reviews.Title: This phone is huge but awesome!
Reviews.Author: Karen J. Walker
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a phone that is a big size, this is your phone.  I LOVE IT!!  You can watch movies one it and yet it still be small enough to handle.  The screen is 6.3 inches big and I'm loving every inch of it.  It's worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: IY
Reviews.Content: Love it! Even sometimes it feels to be too big for my uniform's pocket. It is almost like a tablet and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Haven't Opened my laptop for two weeks!
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: I used to have the s3 which I loved except I literally had to plug in at 4 o'clock in the afternoon everyday, even with little use. I wanted something with a larger screen and also with a battery that lasted for the whole day. With the Mega I have not once had to plug it in until night. Even with heavy use, watching videos, editing videos and other activities, the battery always lasts me the whole day.The only thing I've noticed about the screen is that if you have it tilted back a lot it's kind of hard to see (compared to the s3) but that is such a minor issue. You can see it just fine in the daylight (even better than s3).Yes, you can put it in your pocket. Several of the high school kids have challenge me. I've had them try and even the boys who wear the skinny jeans can fit it.Bought a prepaid SIM card for tmobile at Walmart and had it up and running in no time (no special adjustments needed). Wifi is fast.The only other negative I can think of is that I had to figure out how to change the language from French. Wish I could remember because then I could tell you guys. It's cool because it also came with an international power supply, so it will come in handy the next time I visit Italy. I'm using my old s3 charger. ..but Samsung includes an adapter for US outlets if you need one.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG MEGA 6.3 UNLOCK INT VERSION
Reviews.Author: mane
Reviews.Content: I AM STILL LEARNING HOW TO USE THE PHONE BUT TRULY ENJOYED IT. I NEEDED INTERNATIONAL PHONE FOR A WHILE AND KNOW I HAVE AND USE IT CLAFITY IS CLEAR NO DROP CALL. WOULD REFER OTHER THE PURCHASE

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it! I got it four days early, service was awesome. Manual is in vietnamese, no english manual, sucks about that, but you can just go online for a manual no biggie. I had to call straight talk to activate it for me since I had no patience with it. It can only work with tmobile or at&t.; I have to use tmobile cause at&t; sucks in this part of the country. This phone is massive!One of the reasons I got it, i'm tired of these tiny screens, and with this, i just want to show it off. I'm trying to make my husband get one but he's too worried about it fitting in his pocket blah blah blah, who cares if it doesn't fit anywhere but the palm of your hand lol.

Reviews.Title: speed not fast
Reviews.Author: Kizzy Newman
Reviews.Content: I thought this phone was off 4g but its not I thought I was buying a 4g devicecan this phone be used as 4g phone

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: antonio mckoy
Reviews.Content: exellent came as it said it would be real the phone is made by samsung so of course its good

Reviews.Title: Great phone perfect size
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: This phone is a must have if you like big gadits. Its perfect for me to surf and makes a good conversation. Thanks

Reviews.Title: The phone is huge!
Reviews.Author: Julie Zhu
Reviews.Content: The phone is huge, almost too big. I had a hard time trying to fit it into my small purchase due to the size, I ended up missing at least 30% of my incoming calls cause it was difficult to get to. However, it's got a good screen. Great for showing off photos to your friends and family. Great for surfing the web, or checking Facebook status. It's like a poor man's tablet, with phone capabilities included. It's OK for everything, but not great for anything.

Reviews.Title: MEGA
Reviews.Author: Kola F.
Reviews.Content: You are missing something until you are glued to 'Mega' city in Samsung. You will discover a lot that other phones can not do.
